column4: speaking of that, should i file a bug with warty not being able to auto install my azt2320 soundcard
or just wait til the next release is out and check
paste all the output onto http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org
that's not enough output. I need all of it from when you executed the command.
thats all i get, even if i use make debug, i can use make -d but its a ton of stuff, if you want
i think i need to unbzip the linux source in /usr/src and make a symlink to usr/src/linux
no, don't create that symlink. That's the wrong way to go about it.
that'd be a bad idea, but don't let me stop you from hanging yourself with the rope that Ubuntu gives you.
